atk-s0508a13:256_0: Asmā lokā paramhā ca, ubhayā dhaṁsate naro.

atk-s0508a13:349_5: appatiṭṭho bhavissatī’’ti cintetvā therassa rūpena gantvā taṁ dārikaṁ hatthe aggahesi.
atk-s0508a13:349_8: Taṁ disvā gharajano there appasādaṁ janesi.
atk-s0508a13:349_9: Punadivase thero taṁ kāraṇaṁ anāvajjento taṁ gharaṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a13:349_11: Thero taṁ kāraṇaṁ āvajjento mārassa kiriyaṁ disvā ‘‘tassa gīvāyaṁ kukkurakuṇapaṁ paṭimuñcatū’’ti adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a13:349_12: tassa mocanatthaṁ upagatena mārena atītadivase katakiriyaṁ kathāpetvā taṁ tajjetvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0508a13:351_0: ‘‘Ahu tuyhaṁ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjati;
atk-s0508a13:352_0: Yaṁ tuyhaṁ tuyhamevetaṁ, natthi duccaritaṁ mama.
atk-s0508a13:354_0: ‘‘Aniccā hi calā saddhā, evaṁ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā;
atk-s0508a13:355_0: Rajjantipi virajjanti, tattha kiṁ jiyyate muni.
atk-s0508a13:357_0: ‘‘Paccati munino bhattaṁ, thokaṁ thokaṁ kule kule;
atk-s0508a13:360_1: sā te ajja na vijjatīti, upāsaka,
atk-s0508a13:360_2: ito pubbe tava mayi ‘‘ayyo dhammacārī samacārī’’tiādinā saddhā ahosi,
atk-s0508a13:360_3: sā saddhā te tava ajja idāni na upalabbhati.
atk-s0508a13:360_7: sammā pasannacittena hi dānaṁ nāma dātabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a13:360_8: Atha vā yaṁ tuyhaṁ tuyhamevetanti yaṁ tava mayi ajja agāravaṁ pavattaṁ,
atk-s0508a13:360_12: Natthi duccaritaṁ mamāti mama pana duccaritaṁ nāma natthi maggeneva duccaritahetūnaṁ kilesānaṁ samucchinnattā.
atk-s0508a13:361_0: Aniccā hi calā saddhāti yasmā pothujjanikā saddhā aniccā ekantikā na hoti,
atk-s0508a13:361_1: tato eva calā assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṁ viya,
atk-s0508a13:361_3: Evaṁ diṭṭhā hi sā mayāti evaṁ bhūtā ca sā saddhā mayā tayi diṭṭhā paccakkhato viditā.
atk-s0508a13:361_4: Rajjantipi virajjantīti evaṁ tassā anavaṭṭhitattā eva ime sattā kadāci katthaci mittasanthavavasena rajjanti sinehampi karonti,
atk-s0508a13:361_6: Tattha kiṁ jiyyate munīti tasmiṁ puthujjanānaṁ rajjane virajjane ca muni pabbajito kiṁ jiyyati,
atk-s0508a13:362_1: kathaṁ tumhe yāpethā’’ti evaṁ mā cintayīti dassento ‘‘paccatī’’ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a13:362_2: Tassattho munino pabbajitassa bhattaṁ nāma kule kule anugharaṁ divase divase thokaṁ thokaṁ paccate,
atk-s0508a13:362_5: atthi jaṅghabalaṁ mamāti atthi me jaṅghabalaṁ,
atk-s0508a13:362_6: nāhaṁ obhaggajaṅgho na khañjo na ca pādarogī,
atk-s0508a13:362_9: 123) satthārā vuttanayena piṇḍāya caritvā yāpessāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a13:365_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasaṁ satthu dhammaṁ suṇanto
atk-s0508a13:365_3: satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ vinayadharānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā adhikārakammaṁ katvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthesi.
atk-s0508a13:365_4: So yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi,
atk-s0508a13:365_6: So vayappatto anuruddhādīnaṁ channaṁ khattiyānaṁ pasādako hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajanatthāya
atk-s0508a13:365_7: nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhiṁ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0508a13:366_0: So pabbajitvā upasampanno satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā ‘‘mayhaṁ, bhante,
atk-s0508a13:366_2: Bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṁ vaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0508a13:366_3: amhākaṁ pana santike vasantassa ganthadhurañca vipassanādhurañca paripūressatīti.
atk-s0508a13:366_4: Thero satthu vacanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a13:370_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṁ gato.
atk-s0508a13:372_0: Carakā tāpasā ceva, caranti mahiyā tadā.
atk-s0508a13:374_0: Bahujjano maṁ pūjeti, nāhaṁ pūjemi kiñcanaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:376_0: Buddhoti vacanaṁ natthi, tāva nuppajjate jino.
atk-s0508a13:378_0: Sabbaṁ tamaṁ vinodetvā, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a13:381_0: ‘‘Pitu atthāya so buddho, dhammaṁ desesi cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a13:382_0: Tena kālena parisā, samantā yojanaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a13:388_0: Aṭṭhame divase patte, sunandaṁ kittayī jino.
atk-s0508a13:392_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a13:396_0: Hāsayanto janaṁ sabbaṁ, dassayanto sakaṁ balaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:399_0: ‘‘Tattha me ahu saṅkappo, sutvāna munino vacaṁ;
atk-s0508a13:400_0: Ahampi kāraṁ kassāmi, yathā passāmi gotamaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:404_0: Vinaye agganikkhitto, taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthaye ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:406_0: Tena bhogena buddhassa, ārāmaṁ māpaye ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:416_0: Mā naṁ koci viheṭhesi, santacittāna tādinaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:430_0: Sobhano nāma ārāmo, sampaṭiccha tuvaṁ muni.
atk-s0508a13:437_0: ‘‘Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
atk-s0508a13:452_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a13:454_0: Upāli nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a13:465_0: ‘‘Bhave sātaṁ na vindāmi, ḍayhanto tīhi aggibhi;
atk-s0508a13:470_0: Taṁ pivitvā sukhī assa, visamhā parimuttiyā.
atk-s0508a13:480_0: Tassa so vihane bhūtaṁ, samūlañca vināsaye.
atk-s0508a13:484_0: So me tamaṁ vinodesi, bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:498_0: Devānaṁ sā piyā evaṁ, āsāvatī latuttamā.
atk-s0508a13:500_0: Sāyaṁ pātaṁ namassāmi, devā āsāvatiṁ yathā.
atk-s0508a13:502_0: Dūrāgatampi maṁ santaṁ, khaṇoyaṁ na virādhayi.
atk-s0508a13:508_0: Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṁ gaṇhanti tā sadā.
atk-s0508a13:509_0: ‘‘Cirampi gabbhaṁ dhārenti, yāva megho na gajjati;
atk-s0508a13:518_0: Caturo ca phale sabbe, dhammevaṁ vijanayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:522_0: Na me samasamo atthi, dhāremi sāsanaṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:524_0: Ettha me vimati natthi, akkhare byañjanepi vā.
atk-s0508a13:530_0: Anaññātaṁ mayā natthi, ekaggo satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a13:538_0: Aṭṭālake ca vividhe, kāraye nagare bahū.
atk-s0508a13:544_0: Mā me bhaṇḍaṁ vinassīti, bhaṇḍarakkhaṁ ṭhapeti so.
atk-s0508a13:545_0: ‘‘Mamatto hoti yo rañño, vuddhiṁ yassa ca icchati;
atk-s0508a13:556_0: Saddhā te esikā vīra, dvārapālo ca saṁvaro.
atk-s0508a13:562_0: Āneñjañca nirodho ca, esā dhammakuṭī tava.
atk-s0508a13:566_0: Kolito nāma nāmena, porohicco tavaṁ mune.
atk-s0508a13:570_0: Ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṁ mune.
atk-s0508a13:574_0: Tattha me cintanā natthi, taññevatthaṁ kathemahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:576_0: Vinaye mādiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo bhavissati.
atk-s0508a13:578_0: Upālissa samo natthi, vinaye khandhakesu ca.
atk-s0508a13:584_0: So me attho anuppatto, vinaye pāramiṁ gato.
atk-s0508a13:586_0: Vijahitvāna taṁ jātiṁ, putto jāto mahesino.
atk-s0508a13:589_0: ‘‘Tassa rañño ahaṁ putto, candano nāma khattiyo;
atk-s0508a13:594_0: Āruyha sirikaṁ nāgaṁ, nagarā nikkhamiṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a13:596_0: Devalo nāma sambuddho, āgacchi purato mama.
atk-s0508a13:598_0: Tato sañjātakopo so, nāgo nuddharate padaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:601_0: ‘‘Sātaṁ tattha na vindāmi, siro pajjalito yathā;
atk-s0508a13:608_0: Purā sabbe vinassāma, khamāpessāma taṁ muniṁ.
atk-s0508a13:620_0: Pariḷāhaṁ vinodehi, mā no raṭṭhaṁ vināsaya.
atk-s0508a13:622_0: Ayomayena kūṭena, siraṁ bhindeyyu me sadā.
atk-s0508a13:623_0: ‘‘Dake aggi na saṇṭhāti, bījaṁ sele na rūhati;
atk-s0508a13:624_0: Agade kimi na saṇṭhāti, kopo buddhe na jāyati.
atk-s0508a13:625_0: ‘‘Yathā ca bhūmi acalā, appameyyo ca sāgaro;
atk-s0508a13:626_0: Anantako ca ākāso, evaṁ buddhā akhobhiyā.
atk-s0508a13:628_0: Khantānaṁ khamitānañca, gamanaṁ taṁ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a13:632_0: Samatikkamma taṁ jātiṁ, pāvisiṁ abhayaṁ puraṁ.
atk-s0508a13:638_0: Atthaṁ tuyhaṁ pavakkhāmi, yathā diṭṭhaṁ padaṁ mama.
atk-s0508a13:641_0: ‘‘Mā vo khaṇaṁ virādhetha, khaṇātītā hi socare;
atk-s0508a13:648_0: Āsīviso diṭṭhaviso, evaṁ jhāpeti taṁ naraṁ.
atk-s0508a13:652_0: Sadevakaṁ so tāreti, tasmā te avirādhiyā.
atk-s0508a13:654_0: Pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā.
atk-s0508a13:656_0: Rāhule dhanapāle ca, sabbesaṁ samako muni.
atk-s0508a13:666_0: Kappemi vinaye vāsaṁ, vinayo mama gocaro.
atk-s0508a13:668_0: Upāli taṁ mahāvīra, pāde vandati satthuno.
atk-s0508a13:669_0: ‘‘So ahaṁ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṁ purā puraṁ;
atk-s0508a13:672_0: Tattha hi naṁ satthā sayameva sakalaṁ vinayapiṭakaṁ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0508a13:672_4: Satthā ekekasmiṁ vinicchite sādhukāraṁ datvā tayopi vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā theraṁ vinayadharānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a13:672_5: So aparabhāge ekasmiṁ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesasamaye bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a13:678_0: Saṅghasmiṁ viharaṁ bhikkhu, sikkhetha vinayaṁ budho.
atk-s0508a13:681_0: Kappākappesu kusalo, careyya apurakkhato’’ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a13:682_7: Mitte bhajeyya kalyāṇe suddhājīve atanditeti ‘‘piyo garu bhāvanīyo’’tiādinā (a. ni.
atk-s0508a13:682_12: Saṅghasmiṁ viharanti saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe vattapaṭivattapūraṇavasena viharanto.
atk-s0508a13:682_13: Sikkhetha vinayaṁ budhoti bodhañāṇatāsukusalo hutvā vinayapariyattiṁ sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a13:682_18: Kappākappesūti kappiyākappiyesu kusalo suttavasena suttānulomavasena ca nipuṇo cheko.
atk-s0508a13:682_19: Apurakkhatoti na purakkhato taṇhādīhi kutoci purekkhāraṁ apaccāsīsanto hutvā vihareyya.
atk-s0508a13:685_0: Paṇḍitaṁ vata maṁ santanti āyasmato uttarapālattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a13:685_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato gamanamagge setuṁ kārāpesi.
atk-s0508a13:685_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a13:685_4: uttarapāloti laddhanāmo vayappatto yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karoti.
atk-s0508a13:685_5: Tassa ekadivasaṁ ayonisomanasikāravasena anubhūtārammaṇaṁ anussarantassa kāmarāgo uppajji.
atk-s0508a13:685_6: So tāvadeva sahoḍḍhaṁ coraṁ gaṇhanto viya attano cittaṁ niggahetvā saṁvegajāto paṭipakkhamanasikārena
atk-s0508a13:685_7: kilese vikkhambhetvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto bhāvanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a13:691_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṁ nadanto –
atk-s0508a13:694_0: Pañca kāmaguṇā loke, sammohā pātayiṁsu maṁ.
atk-s0508a13:699_0: ‘‘Sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitā;
atk-s0508a13:702_0: Tattha paṇḍitaṁ vata maṁ santanti sutacintāmayāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannampi nāma maṁ samānaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:702_1: Alamatthavicintakanti attano ca paresañca atthaṁ hitaṁ vicintetuṁ samatthaṁ,
atk-s0508a13:702_10: lokato vā uttaritukāmaṁ maṁ loke pātayiṁsūti attho.
atk-s0508a13:703_3: Devaputtamārassa vā issariyaṭṭhāne taṁ anupavisitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a13:703_8: ahaṁ pāsā pamuccitunti aggamaggasaṇḍāsena rāgādisallaṁ anavasesato uddharantoyeva rāgabandhanasaṅkhātā maccurājassa pāsā ahaṁ parimuccituṁ asakkhiṁ,
atk-s0508a13:704_0: Tato eva ca sabbe kāmā pahīnā me,
atk-s0508a13:704_1: bhavā sabbe padālitāti vatthārammaṇādibhedena anekabhedabhinnā sabbe kilesakāmā ariyamaggena samucchedavasena mayā pahīnā.
atk-s0508a13:704_2: Kilesakāmesu hi pahīnesu vatthukāmāpi pahīnā eva honti.
atk-s0508a13:704_3: Tathā kāmabhavakammabhavādayo bhavā sabbe maggañāṇāsinā padālitā viddhaṁsitā.
atk-s0508a13:704_4: Kammabhavesu hi padālitesu upapattibhavā padālitā eva honti.
atk-s0508a13:704_5: Evaṁ kammabhavānaṁ padālitattā eva vikkhīṇo jātisaṁsāro,
atk-s0508a13:707_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a13:707_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena sāsane abhippasanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a13:707_4: So satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuṁ gahetuṁ mahājane ussāhaṁ karonte sayaṁ sabbapaṭhamaṁ gandhodakena citakaṁ nibbāpesi.
atk-s0508a13:707_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde veṭhapuranagare rājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a13:707_6: abhibhūtoti laddhanāmo pitu accayena rajjaṁ kāreti.
atk-s0508a13:707_7: Tasmiñca samaye bhagavā janapadacārikaṁ caranto anupubbena taṁ nagaraṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a13:707_8: Tato so rājā ‘‘bhagavā kira mama nagaraṁ anuppatto’’ti sutvā satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā dutiyadivase mahādānaṁ pavattesi.
atk-s0508a13:707_9: Bhagavā bhuttāvī tassa rañño ajjhāsayānurūpaṁ anumodanaṁ karontoyeva vitthārato dhammaṁ desesi.
atk-s0508a13:707_10: So dhammaṁ sutvā laddhappasādo rajjaṁ pahāya pabbajitvā arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a13:713_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharante tasmiṁ tassa ñātakā amaccā pārisajjā nāgarā jānapadāti sabbe samāgantvā, ‘‘bhante,
atk-s0508a13:713_1: kasmā tvaṁ amhe anāthe katvā pabbajito’’ti parideviṁsu.
atk-s0508a13:713_2: Thero te ñātipamukhe manusse paridevante disvā tesaṁ attano pabbajjakāraṇavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a13:716_0: Dhammaṁ vo desayissāmi, dukkhā jāti punappunaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:722_0: Pahāya jātisaṁsāraṁ, dukkhassantaṁ karissatī’’ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a13:723_1: idāni mayā vuccamānaṁ ohitasotā sotadvārānusārena upadhārethāti attho.
atk-s0508a13:723_2: Ñātayoti ñātī pamukhe katvā tesaṁ sabbesaṁ ālapanaṁ,
atk-s0508a13:723_5: etissaṁ vā mama pabbajjāya samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0508a13:724_1: taṁ ‘‘dhammaṁ vo desayissāmī’’ti paṭijānitvā ‘‘dukkhā jāti punappuna’’ntiādinā desetuṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a13:724_2: Tattha dukkhā jāti punappunanti jāti nāmesā gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedassa jarādibhedassa ca anekavihitassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhā.
atk-s0508a13:725_0: Tassā pana jātiyā samatikkamanatthaṁ ussāho karaṇīyoti dassento āha ‘‘ārambhathā’’tiādi.
atk-s0508a13:725_2: Nikkamathāti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṁ taduttariṁ vīriyaṁ karotha.
atk-s0508a13:725_3: Yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti yasmā sīlasaṁvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti
atk-s0508a13:725_4: imesu dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṁ jāgariyānuyogavasena ārambhanikkamadhātuyo sampajjanti,
atk-s0508a13:725_5: tasmā tathābhūtā samathavipassanāsaṅkhāte adhisīlasikkhādisaṅkhāte vā bhagavato sāsane yuttappayuttā hotha.
atk-s0508a13:725_7: naḷāgāraṁva kuñjaroti evaṁ paṭipajjantā ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṁ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0508a13:725_8: abalaṁ dubbalaṁ yathā nāma thāmabalūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṁ agāraṁ khaṇeneva viddhaṁseti,
atk-s0508a13:725_9: evameva kilesagaṇaṁ dhunātha vidhamatha viddhaṁsethāti attho.
atk-s0508a13:726_0: Evaṁ pana buddhasāsane ussāhaṁ karontassa ekaṁsiko jātidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento ‘‘yo imasmi’’ntiādinā tatiyaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a13:729_2: Ayaṁ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0508a13:729_3: tassa citakaṁ devamanussesu pūjentesu aṭṭhahi campakapupphehi citakaṁ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a13:729_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā gotamoti
atk-s0508a13:729_5: gottavaseneva abhilakkhitanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a13:735_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṁ ñātakehi ‘‘kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a13:735_1: amhe pahāya pabbajito’’ti puṭṭho saṁsāre attanā anubhūtadukkhañceva idāni adhigataṁ nibbānasukhañca pakāsento –
atk-s0508a13:738_0: Dukkhamamhipi tiracchānayoniyaṁ, nekadhā hi vusitaṁ ciraṁ mayā.
atk-s0508a13:744_0: Taṁ viditvā mahamahattasambhavaṁ, santimeva satimā samajjhaga’’nti. –
atk-s0508a13:746_0: Tattha saṁsaranti anādimati saṁsāre saṁsaranto kammakilesehi pañcasu gatīsu cavanupapātavasena aparāparaṁ saṁsarantoti attho.
atk-s0508a13:746_12: Nekadhā hīti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādivasena ceva kākabalākakulalādivasena ca anekappakāraṁ anekavārañca ciraṁ
atk-s0508a13:746_13: dīghamaddhānaṁ mayā vusitaṁ niccaṁ utrastamānasatādivasena dukkhaṁ anubhūtaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:746_14: Tiracchānayoniyaṁ nibbattasatto mahāmūḷhatāya cirataraṁ tattheva aparāparaṁ parivattatīti dassanatthaṁ idha ‘‘cira’’nti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:747_0: Mānusopi ca bhavobhirādhitoti manussattabhāvopi mayā tādisena kusalakammunā samavāyena abhirādhito sādhito adhigato.
atk-s0508a13:747_3: Saggakāyamagamaṁ sakiṁ sakinti saggagatisaṅkhātaṁ kāmāvacaradevakāyaṁ sakiṁ sakiṁ kadāci kadāci upapajjanavasena agacchiṁ.
atk-s0508a13:747_5: Nevasaññisu asaññisuṭṭhitanti rūpārūpadhātūsu ca na kevalaṁ saññīsu eva,
atk-s0508a13:747_6: atha kho nevasaññīnāsaññīsu asaññīsu ca upapajja ṭhitaṁ mayāti ānetvā yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:747_9: ye pana ito bāhirakā tattha niccasaññino bhavavimokkhasaññino ca,
atk-s0508a13:747_10: tesaṁ tassā saññāya micchābhāvadassanatthaṁ visuṁ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:748_0: Evaṁ dvīhi gāthāhi bhavamūlassa anupacchinnattā anādimati saṁsāre attano vaṭṭadukkhānubhavaṁ dassetvā
atk-s0508a13:748_1: idāni tadupacchedena vivaṭṭasukhānubhavaṁ dassento ‘‘sambhavā’’tiādinā tatiyaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a13:748_3: Kāmabhavādayo eva hi hetupaccayasamavāyena bhavantīti idha sambhavāti vuttā.
atk-s0508a13:748_8: Pacalitāti saṅkhatattā eva uppādajarādīhi pakārato calitā anavaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a13:748_11: Taṁ viditvāmahamattasambhavanti taṁ yathāvuttaṁ saṅkhatasabhāvaṁ attasambhavaṁ attani sambhūtaṁ attāyattaṁ
atk-s0508a13:748_12: issarādivasena aparāyattaṁ pariññābhisamayavasena ahaṁ viditvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṁ santimeva nibbānameva
atk-s0508a13:748_13: maggapaññāsatiyā satimā hutvā samajjhagaṁ adhigacchiṁ ariyamaggabhāvanāya anuppattoti.
atk-s0508a13:748_14: Evaṁ thero ñātakānaṁ dhammadesanāmukhena aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a13:751_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato hāritattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a13:751_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapūjāya kayiramānāya gandhena pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a13:751_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a13:751_4: hāritoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jātimānaṁ nissāya aññe vasalavādena samudācarati.
atk-s0508a13:751_5: So bhikkhūnaṁ santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattā vasalasamudācāraṁ na vissajji.
atk-s0508a13:751_6: Athekadivasaṁ satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā sañjātasaṁvego vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā attano cittappavattiṁ
atk-s0508a13:751_7: upaparikkhanto mānuddhaccaviggahitataṁ disvā taṁ pahāya vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a13:757_0: Arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhaṁ anubhavanto ‘‘yo pubbe karaṇīyānī’’tiādinā tīhi gāthāhi bhikkhūnaṁ ovādadānamukhena aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a13:760_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a13:760_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari parinibbute sādhukīḷanadivasesu vītivattesu
atk-s0508a13:760_4: satthu sarīraṁ gahetvā upāsakesu jhāpanaṭṭhānaṁ gacchantesu satthu guṇe āvajjitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi
atk-s0508a13:760_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a13:760_7: vimaloti laddhanāmo vayappatto somamittattheraṁ nissāya sāsane pabbajitvā teneva ussāhito vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a13:766_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano sahāyassa bhikkhussa ovādaṁ dento –
atk-s0508a13:769_0: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṁ sukhaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:778_2: Bhajeyyuttamapuggalanti sappurisaṁ paṇḍitaṁ kalyāṇamittaṁ ovādānusāsanīgahaṇavasena seveyya.
atk-s0508a13:778_3: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa kalyāṇamittassa ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṁ yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjanavasena tiṭṭheyya.
